# Azure Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) Protection Standard
Azure DDoS Protection Standard provides counter-measurements against the most sophisticated DDoS threats. The service provides enhanced DDoS mitigation capabilities for your application and resources deployed in your virtual networks.

![Azure Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) Protection Standard.](../images/azure-distributed-denial-of-service-protection-standard.png)

Use DDoS Protection Standard:

- Always-on traffic monitoring.
- Adaptive tuning.
- Multi-layered protection.
- Mitigation scale.
- Attack analytics and metrics.
- Attack alerting.
- DDoS rapid response.
